Original_Text: SAN FRANCISCO - A tech startup unveiled a new AI-powered assistant designed to streamline workplace productivity, promising faster task automation.
LONDON - Researchers developed a novel quantum computing algorithm that could enhance data encryption for secure communications.
BOSTON - A university team launched a satellite to monitor climate patterns, aiming to improve weather forecasting models.
SYDNEY - A sports analytics firm introduced a wearable device to track athlete performance, reducing injury risks during training.
TOKYO - A robotics company debuted an autonomous drone for urban deliveries, addressing last-mile logistics challenges.
ATLANTA - The CDC adopted new software to analyze infectious disease spread, improving real-time response capabilities.
BERLIN - A startup showcased a biodegradable battery prototype, aiming to reduce electronic waste in consumer devices.
NEW YORK - A cybersecurity firm reported a surge in phishing attacks targeting remote workers, urging stronger email protections.
CHICAGO - A biotech company received funding to develop a gene-editing tool for treating rare genetic disorders.
SEATTLE - A cloud computing provider announced a new platform to optimize data storage for small businesses.
